PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04172019-05-03,  ,  ,  ,  ISED
ActCanada Business Corporations Act
Canada Cooperatives Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Industry Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY REGULATIONS in order to (1) add the remaining provincial and territorial acts with a definition of "reporting issuer" in their Securities Act to the Schedules; and (2) update the reference to the Quebec Securities Act in the Schedules.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0117 Publication Date: 2019-05-15
AttachmentsAttachment
